      • onConnected

        public void onConnected(Bundle connectionHint)
        Play services when connected can get the location updates. Hence this method is effectively called first. We start the async task here. After this the task is executed onLocationChanged method.
        Specified by:
        onConnected in interface com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.ConnectionCallbacks
        Parameters:
        connectionHint - Bundle of data provided to clients by Google Play services. May be null if no content is provided by the service.
